title: Data Engineer
description:
Role Overview:

Your primary responsibility will entail the creation of audio datasets to bolster the efforts of the audio team, with a particular focus on facilitating multi-language capabilities. Tasks will encompass services, and closely coordinating with the AI Audio division.


Candidate Profile:

We are seeking an individual with demonstrated expertise in handling audio data, with additional proficiency in machine learning, deep learning, or data science being advantageous.


Key Qualifications:

  • Minimum of 3 years of pertinent professional experience
  • Proficiency in Python; familiarity with numpy, pandas, JAX, and PyTorch is desirable
  • Additional language skills in Spanish, Portuguese, Mandarin, or Cantonese would be considered a valuable asset.
